mdRecord.dcterms:title: In Salem, Va., WSLS-TV reporter Bill Walker interviews Virginia Military Institute basketball coach Gary McPherson about his team's prospects at the Virginia Big Five Tournament this weekend
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Virginia Military Institute basketball coach Gary McPherson talks to WSLS-TV reporter Bill Walker about his expectations for the team at the Virginia Big Five Tournament this weekend at the Salem Roanoke Valley Civic Center in Salem, Va. McPherson says this will be a challenging tournament because a few of his players have been suffering from influenza and the team has been preoccupied with exams. Virginia Military Institute will first face the University of Richmond in the tournament.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Basketball
Sports
